(i) NCE merit in

(ii) ‘A’ level 
passes in two (2) of

programme.  
Five (5) 'O' level  
NTC/NBC credit 
passes or TC II merit 
including English 
Language,  
Mathematics,  
Home Economics, 
Biology and 
Chemistry.  
  
 Chemistry,  Biology  or  
Agricultural Science and one 
(1) other subject.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i)      UNN  
(a) for a three (3)-Year Degree programme, it requires any 
of the following in addition to the UTME requirements.  
(b) NCE merit in Home Economics, ND lower credit in 
Fashion and Clothing Management Education or Home 
Economics or Home and Rural Economics or Hotel and 
Catering.  
(c) Candidates with a University Degree in any discipline in 
addition to the departmental UTME requirements may 
be considered for direct entry admission for a three 
(3)year programme.  
 (ii)  BENIN  
a. requires two (2) or three (3) merit in NCE including Home 
Economics plus three (3) or two (2)'O'level credit passes 
in English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science with 
'O' level pass in Chemistry.  
(iii)  LAGOSaccepts  
a. NCE merit or ND creditin Home E conomics, Catering 
and Hotel Management, Textile Management and any 
other relevant subject.  
b. very good passes in three (3) JUPEB subjects Chemistry, 
Biology and one (1) other subject from Economics, Food 
AND Nutrition, Home Management, Clothing and  
Textile.  
c. two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in any two (2) relevant Science 
subjects of Chemistry and any one (1) of Biology, Botany 
and Agricultural Science.  
d. HND credit in Home Economics, Food Science, Hotel 
Management or any other related course.
